title: Was the Identity of a Baseball-Stealing Woman Revealed?
subtitle: A report that a woman who grabbed a baseball away from a child at an Astros game had been identified as child psychologist Grennele Brashkowitz was just fake news.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A woman who grabbed a baseball away from a child at an Astros game was identified as child psychologist Grennele Brashkowitz.
